clues.clue: Scuffed men's shoe, size 10, found near the alley entrance of the Blue Note Club. Appears to have dried mud and a faint reddish stain.
clues.location: Alley outside the Blue Note Club

story_events.description: Headed to the Blue Note Club in the East End to investigate Eddie's disappearance and Silas Vane.
Heading to the Starlight Diner to find Lila, a singer connected to Silas Vane and Eddie's disappearance.
Heading to the old cannery to confront Silas Vane about Eddie and Lila.
